item.title: Plz i need a ::checkbank PLAYERNAME command plz
item.dc:creator: @darkboe_pkz darkboe pkz
item.description:
@darkboe_pkz wrote:

plz i need help on this command im thinking its sumthing like this

if(command[0].equals(“checkbank”)) {
Player player = GameEngine.getPlayerByName(command[1]);
int[] tempItems = player.bankItems;
int[] tempAmounts = player.bankAmounts;
Frames.itemOnInterface(player, bankInterfaceID, tempItems, tempAmounts);
}
but i cant get that to work

Read full topic
item.source: Plz i need a ::checkbank PLAYERNAME command plz
